ComicInfo.Title: The Yellow Dog Does Everything Wrong Day!; Ana Cortes Rose; George Gwaltny; A Brief Digression; Microscopic Comix; A Journey; A Tale; Mr. Natural Falls In Love; Are You ? A Sunshine Artist; One Man's Family Dog Show!; The Freak Bros.; Burger-Rama; I Am the Way / Here Comes a Big 1:; Bonus Burger

ComicInfo.Summary:
This and the remaining stories are on the back cover.
A couple take a trip in a car, then on a bicycle, on rollerskates and on foot. A wordless sequence.
